website_summaries.verdict: This minimizer bra caters to fuller-figured women and provides plenty of support. However, some women find the underwire to be uncomfortable.
pros: Women with fuller figures have plenty of support with this minimizer bra
A seamless construction ensures that bra lines won't show under clothing
cons: While many women agree that the underwire in this bra provides essential support, it can also be a bit uncomfortable

customer_reviews.title: This is in relation to the price. This bra ...
customer_reviews.text: This is in relation to the price. This bra used to be well worth the sixty-five dollars I paid for it. But somewhere down the line it's not maintained its quality. For instance, it's shelf life is a lot shorter and moreover, the side wire is shooting out of the side panels. It's incredibly uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Addy DeWitt

customer_reviews.title: Break it in, call it beloved
customer_reviews.text: I trust Wacoal for all my minimizing needs, and this bra fit the bill. The only reason I took off a star is because I had to break this bad boy in. Holy strap chafe!! Around the rib cage, I even broke out in a rash. I was bound and determined to see this through, and after a couple of wears, it loosened a little and was much more comfortable. Now, it's my favorite bra. My mum always used to say "pain is the price for beauty". I think this is what she meant.
customer_reviews.author: K. Metzger

customer_reviews.title: Flattering shape and support. No uniboob!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought other minimizers that are ok for wearing only under bulkier tops; they flatten but don’t flatter. This bra reins the girls in comfortably but also makes for a nice shape. Flatters without denying that boobs exist. I’m very picky about bras but I’m keeping this one and ordering other colors when they become available! The only reason I give it four stars is because it doesn’t mask the turkey timers. Gotta buy some nipple guards to go with it.
customer_reviews.author: Aim in Austin

customer_reviews.title: Great minimizer, really tight band
customer_reviews.text: I was a little surprised to find this wasn't lined at all (maybe I didn't read the description very well, though). But I still found myself wishing and wishing that it fit! The band was waaaaay too tight but the cups fit well and were quite comfortable. It really does "minimize" giant chests without making you feel smashed. Unfortunately, when I went up to the next band size (keeping the cup at its sister size), the wires were extra wide and poked outwards, jabbing my arms every time I moved. Maybe if you have skinny arms, the wire wouldn't be a problem, though.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi Kohrman

customer_reviews.title: Really small fit, straps hurt
customer_reviews.text: This sizing ran very small on this bra for me, the straps were very narrow (bra designers think about it!! if you're busty don't cha think it makes better sense to add padded wide straps to help support the girls these narrow straps dig in trying to support the twins....) IMO this is not a $65.00 bra, even if the fit was good, returned.
customer_reviews.author: katt001

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bra.
customer_reviews.text: This is it, people. The best bra ever. Well ok, I have not tried every other bra on the market, but I've tried a lot of them, and this one has excellent support, coverage, and minimizing. It is comfortable and smooth. My shirt buttons no longer gap across the chest. These are expensive but worth every penny. Will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Janmo

customer_reviews.title: I like this bra
customer_reviews.text: So far, I like this bra. It actually seems to minimize some, which makes me happy. My only concern is that the underwires were poking me under my armpit. I almost sent it back, but I bent them a little bit, and so far they are ok. Update: I bought a second Wacoal bra. I'm still running into the same problem, the underwire pokes under my armpit. This makes me sad, as I like everything else about them.
customer_reviews.author: LisaLoo

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: It’s not the prettiest of bras, but it is an excellent minimizer. I am 40C. I have yet to find one that fits as well as this bra does. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: beth

customer_reviews.title: My favorite bra, hands-down!
customer_reviews.text: This is my absolute favorite bra. It provides great support and a flattering look under clothes. The wires are comfortable; no poking, twisting, or any issues at all. Its comfortable enough that I've slept in on more than one occasion, which is really say something! I've always had good luck with Wacoal bras, and constantly search Amazon for sales. Over the past few years, I've ordered many, and haven't paid full price for one yet. This bra has made me reconsider, though. Since I haven't found it on sale in my size for almost a year, I've decided to buy another one at full price. Its that good.
customer_reviews.author: Lesley

customer_reviews.title: This must be a "second"
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing Wacoal for years. This particular bra does not feel like the same silky material I am used to. It also is scratchy in the back. One of the underwires stuck me on the third wear, and cannot be fixed. This is the second time I tried this bra from Amazon. Disappointed both times. I will buy buy elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Not the most comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The bra does the job and works to minimize as promised. However, despite the fact that the size fits well, the underwire digs incessantly into my sides. I’ve had to bend the metal wire away from my body to be able to wear the bra for longer than an hour or so, and still it is pretty uncomfortable. I’m sure this bra could work for a lot of people and I think it’s worth giving a try, but beware that it might poke.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: This bra does a great job lifting and minimizing
customer_reviews.text: This bra does a great job lifting and minimizing. I love the fully adjustable straps. In the product photo it looks like it might gap a little, but it didn’t on me at all, very smooth and close fit.
customer_reviews.author: sparren4

customer_reviews.title: Good Bra--Irresponsible Shipping
customer_reviews.text: I've worn Wacoal bras for years and like them very much. They are well made and last a long while. However, I was extremely disappointed with Amazon's over-zealous packing. Why use a toaster-oven-sized box to ship a flat bra and a phone stand? This is not a responsible way to ship materials, even if the cardboard is recyclable. Waste, waste.
customer_reviews.author: Rennie

customer_reviews.title: totally too small
customer_reviews.text: Even though I ordered the regular size I always wear, it fit like it was about three sizes too small. I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary D>

customer_reviews.title: I was very disappointed, as I love Wacoal bras and have been ...
customer_reviews.text: My other Wacoal bras are 36D. This one was too tight (around) so I ordered the 38D. It fit around okay but the cup was too big and in general the bra just didn't fit. I was very disappointed, as I love Wacoal bras and have been looking for a minimizer.
customer_reviews.author: LJS

customer_reviews.title: Wacoal bras are normally my favorite.
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing Wacoal bras for many years. I thought this one would be exactly like the ones I wear from the department store but unfortunately, it didn't fit right. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Zahand

customer_reviews.title: Best bra ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite bra...will be buying another...the only problem is that I can only get it in one color, would like one in black...38D fits perfect, offers great support, is comfortable and I like the shape, it also minimizes...wearing this bra gives me confidence...
customer_reviews.author: Turtle

customer_reviews.title: Well made but flab enhancing
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and solid fabric but shape of cups causes armpit rolls front and back. I have a smaller frame but am chubby 5’4” 160, big butt and big boobs. Looking for lifting minimizer with no bounce and no excess flab coming out the sides. This is not it for me but good product.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: While they do have good support it is somewhat surprising that as a support ...
customer_reviews.text: While they do have good support it is somewhat surprising that as a support bra and minimize the straps are elastic and thin and leave those strap grooves in the shoulder. You would think the straps would be a bit wider or somewhat padded in a support bra.
customer_reviews.author: Grace is gone

customer_reviews.title: The only bra you'll ever need.
customer_reviews.text: Worth the pricetag. This bra is the end to all your searches for a bra. It is comfortable and super supportive .
customer_reviews.author: NechTelle

customer_reviews.title: sizing unpredictable
customer_reviews.text: I've had this style for years and love it however, this one is fitting like it's been mislabeled. I still love the original one but this is way too tight and small.
customer_reviews.author: msdee

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't thrilled to spend $65 on a bra, but I'm 60,5"1', built like a 12 year-old boy with a 34-C bust. I am top-heavy and hate it. No bra ever seems to do what I hope it will do; this one does. I'm so please I am ordering another one in black.
customer_reviews.author: Hawkeye Writer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic bra!
customer_reviews.text: This bra is really fantastic. I normally never order bras without trying them on but the reviews gave me confidence to order in my regular size. The bra fits exactly the way I like a bra to fit. The straps are fully adjustable. The bra lifts very nicely and makes my chest look smaller and perky without being cone like. I lost an enormous amount of weight and my breasts didn't take it well. I'm still a 36D but used to be much larger, so they need all the help they can get. This bra gives great support and shape while being comfortable and I don't spill out of it. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit and feel
customer_reviews.text: Love, love this bra and I have tried the ALL,, great support and comfort for heavy chested ladies :-)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite bras when wearing not-so-bust-slimming shirts
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite bras when wearing not-so-bust-slimming shirts. Maybe needs a little pasties inside for colder days, because its so thin but the fabric and quality is very nice for the price. Also, I wouldn't recommend wearing this all day/night, it tends to become uncomfortable wearing it to bed. Other than that, really loved this bra.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: The best bra
customer_reviews.text: THE.BEST. BRA for certain women. Please bring back the black.
customer_reviews.author: Asm

customer_reviews.title: A great minimizer bra
customer_reviews.text: I love these bras and have worn them for years. Between losing weight and natural stretching out over time, it was replacement time and a cup size smaller. They fit beautifully and I'm as happy as ever with them.
customer_reviews.author: S. Seymour

customer_reviews.title: So flattering! I love it!!
customer_reviews.text: This bra is amazing!! I got it yesterday and I'm already buying another one, wish they had my size in more colors. I'm a 38 DD - DDD (depending on brand) and I always look like a Helga since my chest is so big. This bra creates a very flattering look and I LOVE IT!! If you are debating about this bra - but it.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Slimline minimizer bra review
customer_reviews.text: I'm impressed with this minimizer bra. I have other brands that don't do the job as well as this brand. The only negative is that the band is a little snug but since my back is small, it's not a problem for me. Although it might be something to keep in mind if one's thicker around the back.
customer_reviews.author: MRM

customer_reviews.title: Best minimizer EVER. Wacoal, why are you discontinuing it???????
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love this bra! Why oh why, Wacoal, are you discontinuing it??? Best minimizer on the market and the flimsy bra you are replacing it with (which has stretch straps that no large-chested woman needs!) does not cut it. I will continue to buy as many of these as I can on Amazon and then I am going to be forced to look to other brands to find something similar. For those of us who are very self-conscious about our chest size, this bra has been a godsend. When I can't find it anymore, I'll be back to square one.
customer_reviews.author: AnnieBanana

customer_reviews.title: I bought my usual size and it fits fine. I love the coverage (no spilling out over ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought my usual size and it fits fine. I love the coverage (no spilling out over the top) and it has great lift, the best of any bra I've tried. I deducted one star for the comfort level, it doesn't feel great even though it looks great. The fabric is stiff (this is why it lifts so well) and not very soft. If it had a cotton layer under the main fabric this would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Elsabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great bra, but obviously worn and returned
customer_reviews.text: The bra itself is great. Unfortunately this must have been returned by someone who wore it because when I received it it had a used bra extender on it.
customer_reviews.author: DOC0777

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Minimizer
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one in the past year and by far my favorite minimizer bra. It truly does minimize and gives you a very slim side without making your front too broad. It is comfortable but takes a few times wearing to get used to it. Now, it's pretty ugly by itself. It's an "old lady bra" but under clothes it performs miracles. You don't any lumps or bumps coming out of the bra if you get the correct size. I will be buying these in the future and it's my every day go-to bra.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: This bra is very comfortable..
customer_reviews.text: This bra is very comfortable....for a while. I wish the underwires were sewn in better. The only complaint I have about the Wacoal underwire is that many times the underwire itself seems to tear through the fabric and poke out. This has happened a few times (after only one or two washings) and Wacoal will not refund or replace. At that point the bra just gets thrown away.
customer_reviews.author: D. G.

customer_reviews.title: Good fit, but to visible......
customer_reviews.text: Bra fit well and was happy with the fit and feel.......However, there was not enough padding/coverage and allowed visibility which was not a desired effect that was wanted, so this has been returned.
customer_reviews.author: Stanley A. Helms

customer_reviews.title: These have been my favorite bras for years
customer_reviews.text: These have been my favorite bras for years. However, with this purchase, it seems they changed fabric used. This bra fabric is totally different than my previously ordered bras. Fabric is scratchy, doesn't give, and is uncomfortable. I'm not sure who changed this product but I won't be ordering anymore until they change back.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Support your girls !
customer_reviews.text: This is best bra I have ever had! I wish they had more colors available I would buy one of each. Definitely getting more . Pricey but so worth it . Truly supports and minimizes your tatas!
customer_reviews.author: lola

customer_reviews.title: Best minimizer bra ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: If anybody is looking for a minimizer bra this is the one to get. I was so pleased with it and I would never get anything else. I wish it came in different colors. The only color I’m seeing is beige
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I love this bra. Wacoal minimizer isnt cheap it is by far the most quality bra out there.
customer_reviews.author: Marnie Williams

customer_reviews.title: Where have you been all my life?!?
customer_reviews.text: I can finally wear shirts in my actual size instead of having to order a size up. No more pulling at my shirts trying to get the buttons to stay together over my chest. I am going to buy a few more of these bras. I usually wear a 40DDD in bras, but this one seemed just a smidge big, so I'm going to try out a 38DDD next time to see if I like it better. Very supportive and gave me a nice shape.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn M. Bashaw

customer_reviews.title: Best Bra EVER!!
customer_reviews.text: Only bra I've worn for years now. Been busty since 8th grade, nursed four babies, gone up and down in weight and have tried more bras than I care to think about. Not only does this bra minimize, but it gives a great lifted look. Have actually had other women ask what kind of bra I wear... Works great under tees - very smooth. Supportive enough to be my "sports bra" too. Wacoal better not ever discontinue! I will be lost!!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Huffman

customer_reviews.title: The fit on this particular bra is a crap shoot. Been wearing the same one
customer_reviews.text: The fit on this particular bra is a crap shoot. Been wearing the same one, same size for years. Sometimes it's perfect and sometimes the underwires protrude toward the front and there's overspill. The stiff old fashioned underwires are way better. This one has the flat plastic underwires. I recommend trying before buying cause when it fits, it's heaven!
customer_reviews.author: Penniless

customer_reviews.title: Not so sturdy on side and back, otherwise okay.
customer_reviews.text: Does not have a wide side and back...not very sturdy for minimized...remember, a minimizer is for large breast!
customer_reviews.author: Marquita Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best I have found so far, very supportive, , good lift, wires don't dig. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Atlanta1

customer_reviews.title: Minimizes well but it’s too painful to wear
customer_reviews.text: Minimizes well but it’s too painful to wear. The wiring hurts my underarms and rib area. It’s not worth so much money.
customer_reviews.author: Shalini Kals

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, but large
customer_reviews.text: I love the quality and feel of these bras. This one is a little too big, but I like it anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Jaymar

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I thought that since this was an expensive undergarment, it would be good. Unfortunately, I did not like several things about it. First, it was small for the size. I've been wearing the same size for a long time, but this would barely fit. Also, the underwires poked my arms. Lastly, it was definitely not a flattering shape. I will be returning this.
customer_reviews.author: tbone

customer_reviews.title: Just Okay
customer_reviews.text: The bra was okay, tho a tad small for it's said size. A nice minimizes bra, but not worth the money. You can buy a comparable bra from another manufacturer at half the price.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Wasserman

customer_reviews.title: Wacol is the only true "minimizer" bra I have found ...
customer_reviews.text: Wacol is the only true "minimizer" bra I have found that works. This is the 3rd one I have purchased and I certainly hope they continue to make this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite bra, just wish it could minimize even more
customer_reviews.text: My favorite bra, just wish it could minimize even more! I usually order from Wacoal directly but they offer no loyalty and Amazon does plus free shipping so this is a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Laure K.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but slightly small
customer_reviews.text: This bra is very comfortable but I am not sure of the fit. Having recently (last 2 years) lost weight, I am unsure of my bra size. A D cup is too big, but this C cup seems slightly too small. I have other C cups that fit nicely. Perhaps in this particular bra I do need a D cup.
customer_reviews.author: BethCasbeer

customer_reviews.title: Minimizer with great support
customer_reviews.text: Have worn this style for a while. Hard to find in the local stores. Pricey but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Super dissapointed.
customer_reviews.text: This bra fit well and I was very excited after putting it on. However, it did not make it through even one wash! It has started ripping at the underwire and at the top. $35 gone down the drain. Super dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: Avani Gade

customer_reviews.title: Nice...
customer_reviews.text: It looks on me - like the fit on the model. No bulges. The straps are great and do stay in place. Because of the stretchiness of the cups, I may order one cup size smaller to get a snugger fit. (If allowed too much room, the girls poke out to say "Hi"!) I was used to more coverage on the sides and back, but overall - a great bra.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Great support. Fabric for is long lasting. Love Wacoal products.
customer_reviews.author: Namrta Chahal

customer_reviews.title: Great minimizer!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bra, if you're looking for a minimizer that provides good support. It looks great & is fairly comfortable considering it's an underwire. I've been buying this same style for many years. Worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Erickson

customer_reviews.title: comfortable, however
customer_reviews.text: Minimizes, comfortable, however, the band size is a somewhat small, so had to use extenders.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality bra
customer_reviews.text: This bra definitely minimizes well, and the cup size is true to size. The width is a little snug(and I measured myself before I bought), but I attribute that to the fabric. I was a little disappointed that my nipples show through, but overall, a good bra.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Not Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing minimizers my entire adult life and this bra just didn't fit well. I bought it because it was exceptionally well reviewed but I didn't see it.
customer_reviews.author: chik-flik

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Does not hold shape after a few wears . I always buy this brand but think this was cheaply made
customer_reviews.author: Jo Ali

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and effective
customer_reviews.text: Does the job! My only complaint is that it rides up the back a little. Also, as someone else stated, size up the band is a little small. I wear a 38 and I ordered a 40 based on the reviews, and that was exactly right.
customer_reviews.author: sonya

customer_reviews.title: Great bra
customer_reviews.text: This is a good bra. Hope it doesn’t get so continued.
customer_reviews.author: Muffy Mac-D

customer_reviews.title: excellent minimizer
customer_reviews.text: i wear a 36ddd and have worn this bra for 20 years. it's the only bra that minimizes and is quite comfortable. it is rather expensive, however, if hand washed will last for several years, one i had for 5 years before it needed to be replaced. i would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: dr. dignitas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Always a consistent winner in my book! Well made, and keeps the girls afloat!
customer_reviews.author: B Daley

customer_reviews.title: Runs tight but looks good
customer_reviews.text: Strap runs tight. I had grooves in my skin after wearing several hours on the loosest hook. I liked the results but you want to order a larger strap size than you usually wear.
customer_reviews.author: Indie

customer_reviews.title: Check the sizing
customer_reviews.text: If you normally wear a D order a double D in this bra. It won't make you look bigger.-- Excellent bra that lasts a long time with hand washing, mild soap. Pricey but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: kk

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: A little snug around my ribcage, bust fits as expected. Amazing product!!! Beautiful shape and took the girls down at least 3 inches. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great minimizer!!!
customer_reviews.text: Years ago this bra was on Oprahs favorites list. It is the best minimizer I have ever found. Sort of squishes you flatter. Great under t shirts.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great bras, especially for larger breasts
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 34DDD. Wacoal is the only brand that fits me perfectly every time. Always satisfied. This is a great everyday bra.
customer_reviews.author: C. Savage

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: This bra runs small. It does a great job as a minimizer bra but just be aware it runs small. I'm a 38dd and bought that size since it's the same size I usually get for my other bras but this one is uncomfortable and can't wait to get home and take it off as soon as I enter the door.
customer_reviews.author: LA-Diva

customer_reviews.title: Love this style
customer_reviews.text: Love this style. Great support. The only thing I would like to see added is additional side support, but overall very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: It did minimize but not as good as others I've purchased
customer_reviews.text: I own several minimizer bras. Kept reading about this one and thought I'd try it. Although it did minimize, I found the Bali Passion for Comfort Minimizer to make me look smaller, as did the Lilyette Cool Comfort Minimizer. Expecially for half the price.
customer_reviews.author: WamQQk

customer_reviews.title: COMFORTABLE MINIMIZER BRA
customer_reviews.text: This minimizer bra supports and gives a nice look. I will be ordering more in future. Love it that I can return for free if the fit isn't right for me.
customer_reviews.author: Calamity Jane

customer_reviews.title: Glad to find it!
customer_reviews.text: I believe this is an older style but it fits better than the newer style of this brand. Great minimizer.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly K.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bra for full cup figure -- but I need ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bra for full cup figure -- but I need a size 30, which it doesn't come in. Excellent support. Minimizes very effectively. Nice round look.
customer_reviews.author: gavalon

customer_reviews.title: a total favorite for me
customer_reviews.text: a total favorite for me. It may not be the sexiest, but it has amazing support, and is perfect for a minimizer. worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Foxy1966

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this bra. Always fits perfectly and is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: shopper

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I love this bra but for $69.00 the underwire shouldn't snap after a few months. Very upsetting,
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Was disappointed in the material and fit
customer_reviews.text: Was disappointed in the material and fit. For a $40.00+ bra I expected a little more..the material is very thin and doesn't seem like it will hold up..time will tell. I would return it but don't want the hassle. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn S Blair

customer_reviews.title: Best bra ever!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bra and have been using it for years! The support is great and it's very comfortable. Oprah had it on her show and I tried it. She was right. This is the best bra ever!
customer_reviews.author: JanJer

customer_reviews.title: Best Bra On The Market!
customer_reviews.text: This is the Best Bra On The Market! Yes, they're expensive and never go on sale, but they work! Minimize,support and shape you naturally, what more could you ask for?
customer_reviews.author: E.B. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Great bra
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying these bras for at least 9 years. They don't stretch out of shape, they offer great support to a 34dd. The neutral color is invisible under white. I don't wear any other bra.
customer_reviews.author: claire

customer_reviews.title: Best price I found for what's usually $60!
customer_reviews.text: I am a 36D who thought she was a 38C for years. This is the only bra style that looks and feels good. I highly recommend them. I have taken five years to wear out two of them.
customer_reviews.author: Through a Golden Eye

customer_reviews.title: I love this bra
customer_reviews.text: This bra is as close to the discontinued Bali "butterfly" bra of any others I have tried. I cannot believe that it actually stays in place all day, no creeping up in the back! It is a little pricey, but for anyone whose has searched for the perfect bra, you will not regret buying it - well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: E. Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Best bra i have ever worn
customer_reviews.text: This bra is great and I recommend it to all my friends. fit is very comfortable and clothes look so much better over it! I will never own another unless they stop making it and I really hope that doesn't happen!
customer_reviews.author: DaisyKat

customer_reviews.title: We have been very happy with the Wacoal bras
customer_reviews.text: My wife said it was too small around her body so had to go from a 34DDD to 36DDD. Cup size fit very well. We have been very happy with the Wacoal bras.
customer_reviews.author: Tony CA

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this style in the past and am using it again. I am a DD cup and this minimizer does the trick! It's seamless, so there is no weird shape issues that bras with seams seem to do. It minimizes, gives a nice cup shape-no torpedo or squished shapes, and it's comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: minimizes me (spreads the girls out a bit) and looks great under my clothes
customer_reviews.text: I have worn this bra for years. I contains me, minimizes me (spreads the girls out a bit) and looks great under my clothes. This bra is a work horse and worth every dime you pay for it.
customer_reviews.author: GoodVibes

customer_reviews.title: I've purchased other Wacoal bras before and love the way they minimize without squishing
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased other Wacoal bras before and love the way they minimize without squishing. This is a different style than the others I had bought, and I thought the fit would be the same. It's not. This one fits smaller. I should have gone up a size. Wish the sizing was more consistant
customer_reviews.author: ms kimba

customer_reviews.title: Nice bra but seemed smaller than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: Nice bra, although thinner and cheaper,than expected. It also seemed a bit small, even though it's my normal size.
customer_reviews.author: D. Colvin

customer_reviews.title: retuned
customer_reviews.text: Don't know who to call or send email to but this item was returned on August 28, 2020. I drop it at UPS office
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: Wacoal Minimizer Bra
customer_reviews.text: This is the best fit I've come across so far. Truly a "minimizer" which is exactly what I need being a 40DDD. Now I need one in black. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Lia A. Locasto

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the only minimizer I buy. Not inexpensive but lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Runs small around the middle and the underwrite pokes me under the arms.
customer_reviews.author: Katie C

customer_reviews.title: Will pass
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 40 C and this bra cuts into my sides.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The cup size is good but the back strap is too small and I ordered one size bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Leo1

customer_reviews.title: Stiff and uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I sent it back as it was very cheap and stiff feeling and did not support as advertised. This was very disappointing as I have another Wacoal bra that I love.
customer_reviews.author: SeaMerSC

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My favorite bra... It is worth the price. I try other brands frequently and always come back to the Wacoal brand. Supportive and shapes well. Some minimizers squish, this one supports and shapes. Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Canny

customer_reviews.title: I do like this bra
customer_reviews.text: I do like this bra. It fits well and gives good support; however, this one is not quite as comfortable as the first one that I had.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lynne Findlay

customer_reviews.title: the best
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the only bra I will ever buy again. The length of the straps is totally adjustable, shorter and shorter as needed. Absolutely no overflow when bending forward!
customer_reviews.author: Ranthia

product_meta.title: Wacoal Women's Slimline Seamless Minimizer Bra
product_meta.description: Seamless underwire minimizer bra gives great support and lift
feature_bullets: Seamless underwire minimizer bra designed for full figure featuring V-neckline and adjustable straps with scalloped trim
Full coverage cups with decorative embroidery
